Entries.1056: Orca/750/-50/Fish -4/Orca/One of the ocean's apex predators. Don't try to eat it, it will bite you.
Entries.1057: Prismatic Orca/2500/-100/Fish -4/Prismatic Orca/An orca that has eaten several prismatic shards. An even worse biter than the common orca.
Entries.1058: Goblin Shark/375/25/Fish -4/Goblin Shark/A hideous predator of the dim depths. Tasty!
Entries.1059: Galaxy Fish/250/50/Fish -4/Galaxy Fish/This fish contains a multitude of stars, planets, nebulas, and civilizations. Or at least that's what its scales seem to indicate.
Entries.1060: Lanturn/100/5/Fish -4/Lanturn/How did a Pokemon get to Stardew Valley?
Entries.1061: Kira Fish/250/25/Fish -4/Kira Fish/Named for an ancient princess of the Rainbow Baby Cheetah kingdom.
Entries.1062: Mr. Septapus on the Phone/450/80/Fish -4/Mr. Septapus on the Phone/Don't interrupt, he's talking.
Entries.1063: Bipus/100/-5/Fish -4/Bipus/Easy catch for beginners. A strange creature that doesn't care about being caught.
Entries.1064: Yellow Fish/600/46/Fish -4/Yellow Fish/Adores summer, carrots, and warm hugs.
Entries.1065: Dragonfish/1000/275/Fish -4/Dragonfish/A predator that lures in prey with its bioluminescent flashes.
Entries.1066: Lightybulb/400/30/Fish -4/Lightybulb/A small yet cunning fish that is easy to identify by its colorful flashes.
Entries.1067: Soggy Waffle/2/150/Fish -4/Soggy Waffle/Never eat soggy waffles!
Entries.1068: Sewer Slime/3400000/500/Fish -4/Sewer Slime/Me name is Dry Banana Hippy Hat!

Entries.1062: Mr. Septapus on the Phone/10/smooth/36/84/0000 2359/spring summer fall winter/both/9999 .9/3/.5/.5/0

Entries.221: Orcas and Prismatic Orcas are tough to catch. Only advanced fishers can do it. They come around the beaches on cold winter days, looking for seals.
Entries.222: You can catch goblin sharks on the beach, but only in the spring and summer.
Entries.223: Galaxy Fish live in rivers and lakes. You can catch them on cool nights in the fall and winter.
Entries.224: Lanturns aren't really fish, but you can catch them like fish. They like late nights and avoid Stardew Valley in the winter. Catch 'em in the ocean.
Entries.225: Kira Fish like splashing in the rivers on sunny summer days.
Entries.226: Folks, I've got an announcement to make. This is the last new episode of Livin' Off The Land before my retirement. I've had a good time, and I'll miss you folks. But before I go, let me tell you about the legend of the Prismatic Orca. Rumor has it that it was created by a kind old wizard to delight his children -- and if you catch one, your children will be as strong, colorful, and downright cute as the Prismatic Orca itself! Happy fishing!

Entries.Mon8: You know, @, sometimes I see a flash of color, shining like a gem under the surface of the sea. The legend says it might be the Prismatic Orca, but I'm pretty sure it's just sea scum. Weird!
